title: === LF decent bronze players for ranked play ===
body:
Hi there,

I'm looking for bronze players for ranked play. I just transferred my account from NA ( where I was gold 4) to OCE so had to replay placement matches. I currently got placed in bronze4 and looking to climb up quickly. I main adc and mid but can also play as supp if required. 

Must meet below criteria:

+ Must have at least 1:1 ratio of win/losses in ranked play.
+ Must cope well under pressure aka no raging/flaming others.
+ Decent personality.

If this looks like you please add me in game and we can chat thanks.

replies.body: Similar situation. Although 1:1 ratio is not nearly what i have (thank bronze 3 for 11/3 caits at 15 minutes, every single lane losing, etc), i transfered from EUW where i was S1/G5 for a long time.

Hey! I was in Bronze about a month ago when I relooked at the game with a fresh mindset and climbed to Silver in 3 weeks, improving my win rate to 54%. I learned to not tilt in the face of losses and I think it helped.
